description: Example project showing BuildRunner 3.0 feature tracking

features.name: User Authentication
features.description: Implement user registration, login, and session management with JWT tokens.

features.name: REST API Endpoints
features.description: Create FastAPI endpoints for user management, data CRUD, and admin operations.

features.name: Database Schema
features.description: Design and implement PostgreSQL schema with migrations and seed data.

features.name: Frontend User Interface
features.description: Build React-based UI with responsive design and dark mode support.

features.name: Automated Testing
features.description: Comprehensive test suite with unit, integration, and e2e tests achieving 90%+ coverage.

features.name: CI/CD Pipeline
features.description: GitHub Actions pipeline for automated testing, building, and deployment.
